021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.dvs.versioning.BasicVersioning;
023import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.settings.loader.LoaderSettings;
024import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.settings.updater.UpdaterSettings;
025import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
027import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.config.Config;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.message.translation.Language;
031import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.IOUtil;
032
033import java.io.File;
034import java.util.Collections;
035import java.util.HashMap;
036import java.util.Map;
037import java.util.Optional;
038import java.util.UUID;
039
040/**
041 * MessageConfig
042 *
043 * @author creatorfromhell
044 * @since 0.1.2.0
045 */
046public class MessageConfig extends Config {
047
048  private static MessageConfig instance;
049
050  private final Map<String, Language> languages = new HashMap<>();
051
052  public MessageConfig() {
053
054    super("messages.yml", "messages.yml", Collections.singletonList("Messages"),
055          LoaderSettings.builder().setAutoUpdate(true).build(),
056          UpdaterSettings.builder().setAutoSave(true).setVersioning(new BasicVersioning("Messages.config-version")).build());
057
058    instance = this;
059  }
060
061  public static YamlDocument yaml() {
062
063    return instance.getYaml();
064  }
065
066  public String getString(final String node, final UUID player) {
067
068    final Optional<Account> account = TNECore.eco().account().findAccount(player);
069
070    if(account.isPresent() && account.get() instanceof PlayerAccount) {
071
072      return getString(node, ((PlayerAccount)account.get()).getLanguage());
073    }
074
075    if(yaml().contains(node)) {
076      return yaml().getString(node);
077    }
078    return node;
079  }
080
081  public String getString(final String node, final String lang) {
082
083    if(languages.containsKey(lang) && languages.get(lang).hasTranslation(node)) {
084      return languages.get(lang).getTranslation(node);
085    }
086
087    if(yaml().contains(node)) {
088
089      return yaml().getString(node);
090    }
091    return node;
092  }
093
094  public void loadLanguages() {
095
096    final File directory = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "languages");
097    if(!directory.exists()) {
098      directory.mkdir();
099      return;
100    }
101
102    final File[] langFiles = IOUtil.getYAMLs(directory);
103
104    if(langFiles != null) {
105
106      for(final File langFile : langFiles) {
107
108        final String name = langFile.getName().replace(".yml", "").replace(".yaml", "");
109
110        try {
111
112          final YamlDocument config = YamlDocument.create(langFile);
113
114          final Language lang = new Language(name, config);
115
116          languages.put(name, lang);
117
118          PluginCore.log().inform("Loaded language: " + name);
119        } catch(final Exception ignore) {
120
121          PluginCore.log().debug("Failed to load language: " + name);
122        }
123      }
124    }
125  }
126}
